title.rendered: Loading System For None NSR Preform

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

Loading System For None NSR Preform

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]None NSR preforms are mainly used for pharmaceutical and cosmetic containers. Due to the preform design, it caused the problems during the preform loading.

WASHUN Machinery has introduced the special designed preform loading system for the preforms that have minimal, or even no neck support ring.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4373″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Bottle Samples

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Applications
Pharmaceutical containers, elegant premium bottles, cosmetic and detergent containers

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]None NSR preform handling system requires customization Stretch blow molding machines.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]– MG-880 Stretch blow molding machine
– MG-900 Stretch blow molding machine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
